recipe_name: Bruschetta of roasted pepper and Dolcelatte
author: Nick Nairn
method: Preheat the grill to medium. Drizzle a slice of ciabatta with olive oil and then griddle for 1-2 minutes on each side.  Warm the sliced roasted red peppers in a small pan and then spoon onto the griddled bread. Place the crumbled Dolcelatte cheese on top of the peppers and place under the grill for 1-2 minutes or until bubbling.  Slide onto a plate and serve.
ingredients: 1 slice ciabatta,  dash olive oil,  1 roasted red pepper from a jar, drained, sliced,  55g/2oz Dolcelatte cheese, crumbled
